dialog: Greetings, good sir! Would thou be interested in procuring some enchanted herbs?
Excuse me, what herbs?
Why, 'tis the green fairy's gift, also known as Potentilla, or Gillyweed! The wizarding community refers to it as Mary Jane or chronic.
Ah, I see. I must decline, good sir.
Fear not, I have something stronger still! A pinch of dragon's breath, perhaps? A potion to take you on a journey beyond the veil?
No thank you, truly. I have no interest in such things.
Come now, I have in my possession rare elixirs such as DoxyCide and even a drop of liquid luck. Dost thou not wish to sample some?
Do you truly have these illicit potions? Pray tell, from whence do you acquire them?
Fear not, I have connections with the goblin underworld. Simply state what it is you desire and I shall grant you a complimentary ounce.
Hmmm, that is most generous of you. I would like to, let me see...
Yes?
I want you to place thy hands behind thy head, for thou art under arrest!
The carriage drivers have ceased their services in protest.
For what reason, pray tell?
They seek the government's intervention in the reduction of the price of firewhisky.
Indeed, 'tis a difficult matter.
We have managed to decrease our factory's energy consumption by a substantial 15 percent in the past two years.
Bravo! How have you achieved such a feat?
We have invested in a heat recovery charm, which has proven most effective.
I beg your pardon, what is a heat recovery charm?
